data.text: @Aboundlessworld Hi, in order to help you send us more details about your booking via DM. Regards.
@MarinellaEraso Thank you, for confidentiality and your security let us know the name of the passenger. Regards.
@MarinellaEraso Hello, please in order to help you send us a DM with your request. Regards.
@jmmejor Hola, te enviamos una respuesta por DM. Saludos.
@sergiogomezf Hello, please in order to give you the proper information about your flight send us a DM with the reservation code or ticket number. Regards.
@Andrea82009821 Please send us a DM with more details of your request. If you have a booking code, send it too. We also need your full name. Regards.
@susan_margarita Hello, in order to check the information, please send us via DM your booking code or ticket number. We will await for your reply, regards.

@BruceDouglass10 Hi, we understand your concern about the situation. We have entered your comments in the case to be taken in consideration. As soon as we have an update, we will contact you by email. Kind regards.

urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of United States.

data.text:
@Andrea82009821 Hello Andrea, through the following link you can verify our contact numbers:
https://t.co/hItWh0Bivf
We also attach the link so you can validate the requirements for your flight:
https://t.co/AsCfRgoWRa
Regards.
@stephenkbrasil We sent you a response via DM, regards.
@stephenkbrasil Hi, we have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@TrooperSteve_ Hi, regarding your case 30736658, we have sent you an answer on February 26. Regards.
@marcusreis31 We have sent you a response via DM, regards.
@filipemasetti Hi, we replied to you via DM. Regards.
@marcusreis31 Hola Marcus, te hemos enviado información por DM.
@CRMoraga Hi, send us a DM with your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name. We'll stay tuned.
@pamiz We have given you an answer by DM, greetings.
@marcusreis31 Hi, send us your booking code and full name through your DM to check the situation. Regards.
@filipemasetti Hi, as soon as we have any update about your request, we will notify you. Regards.
@yandzman_ Hi, sure, please send us a DM. Regards.
@filipemasetti Thank you for contacting us, regards.
@filipemasetti We have sent you a response via DM, regards.

@filipemasetti Hello, calling our contact center is the best way to get in touch with an executive, but we also provide service through social networks. As soon as we have an update on your case, we will contact you by email. Regards.

@filipemasetti Hello, the deadline for the resolution of cases has been extended due to the high demand, we apologize for the delayed, and we suggest that when you have a similar problem on our website you contact us by this means or by contact center to assist you. Regards.
@krLitabuBa Hi, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@krLitabuBa Hello, in order to help you send us the details of your case via DM. Regards.
@GoonSquad612 Hello, in order to help you please send us more information about your request via DM. Regards.
@GoonSquad612 We kindly invite you to formalize your claim here: https://t.co/RHQPTcM7rS. Regards.
@GoonSquad612 Hi, we have verified the case provided and indeed the ticket expired last year. You can formalize your claim through this link: https://t.co/TaW7UJBe6N. Regards.

urls.title: Requisitos para viajar | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Conoce las restricciones para viajar dentro y fuera de Estados Unidos.

data.text: @AliUrmeneta ...Acá encuentras toda la información https://t.co/2wRvJb6OnX. Quedamos atentos ante futuras consultas.

@AliUrmeneta Hola, debes validar con el consulado el tema de la documentación. Todos los pasajeros ingresando a Estados Unidos deberán presentar una prueba con resultado negativo de test para SARS-COV-2 cuya toma de muestra haya sido realizada dentro de los 3 días previo al embarque...

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @Cc69020760 Hi, send us a DM with more details, please.
@muzio_clementi Hola, te respondimos por DM. Saludos.

@seba_nyc Hola, hemos actualizado su ticket con informacion relevante para que se brinde una respuesta lo antes posible, estaremos en contacto con usted para informarle sobre la resolución de su caso. Saludos.

@Tatiana96480821 Hi, we sent you a DM.

@bbycryroci Hi, we are working on your request, we will send you more information through your email. Regards.
@melissa2six Hello, we regret the inconvenience, in order to provide you with assistance, tell us your requirement thought our DM. Regards.
@nicky_dillon Te respondimos el DM. Saludos.

data.text: @gusshp We've replied through DM, regards.
@gusshp Hi, please provide via DM, the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.

@anthonybphoto Hi, can you send us more details through DM, and also send us your full name, account number, date of birth, email address, country of residence, and last flight we can see in your account. We'll stay tuned.
@Matthew432112 We've replied through DM, regards.

@IagainstI01 Hi, could you please DM your booking code (6 capital letters) or electronic ticket number (13 digits) and the name and last name of the passenger if you already have a reservation with LATAM. We will be waiting for your reply.
@MaikoQuintanil1 Para brindarte una asistencia oportuna, por favor envíanos los detalles por DM. Quedamos atentos.
@MaikoQuintanil1 Por favor indícanos si deseas asistencia en español o portugués. Saludos.
@missjennrojas We sent more information through a DM. Regards.
@missjennrojas Hi, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@camilafusari Estamos trabajando activamente en tu caso, tan pronto contemos con la solución a tu requerimiento seras notificada. Saludos.

@JerseyShore411 Hi, in order to check the information, please provide via DM, the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@BodyK_Testing We are proud to have you as our partners; alliances like these help our passengers to have a safe and secure flight. Being committed to everyone's health is #WhatMakesUsFly.
@LuisGiuliani Hi, could you please send us by DM your booking code or electronic ticket number in order to verify the information. Kind regards.
@jusjessi We continue to work on your case. Rest assured that we will contact you as soon as we have the corresponding resolution, regards.
@AshimaADayal Hello, we replied through DM, regards.
@guiagustini1 We replied to your DM. Regards.

@guiagustini1 Hi, in order to check the information, please provide via DM, the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@jeremyatl1 Hi, we've attached your comments to your case, we will send you a formal answer about the situation through your contact means. Regards.
@TJKip Hello, in order to provide more information, send us the booking code and the names of the passengers via DM. Regards.
@gacedaro Hello, send us a DM with your information. Regards.

@SilviaOrejuela Silvia, sabemos lo importante que es para ti viajar con tu mascota, sin embargo las restricciones nos ayudan con el cuidado de estos mismos, ya que nuestro deber es cuidar y brindarte seguridad a la hora de realizar el viaje. Saludos.
@CiaranMulligan1 Hi, can you send us a DM with more details of your request, please?
@CristianoFeit17 Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@TheRealFrazz Hello, send us your reservation code or ticket number through DM.
@gacedaro That is the option to check the flights available. We recommend you to call our contact center to request the change. Regards.
@riley_globetrtr Thanks for contact us. Regards.
@jusjessi Hi, we are working on your case 30219173 and we will send you an email with more information. Regards.

@gacedaro Gabriela, your flight was cancelled and the system already provide you with new flights, 
LA2381O 02APR New York - Lima 2320-0605 03APR 
LA 0643 03APR Lima - Santiago 0720-1254
LA 2376 17APR Santiago - Lima 1750-2035
LA 2380 18APR Lima - New York 0015-0905
Write back to confirm
@riley_globetrtr Hello Riley, no matter the situations on any of those cases, you can book a ticket 10 months in advance, that is as far as our system can go. Regards.
@gacedaro Hi, please send us a DM with your full name and booking code. Regards.
@AshimaADayal Hi, we sent you a DM.
@juana23788686 Gracias por tu gentil comprensión, mantente atenta a nuestro contacto. Saludos.
@juana23788686 Nos comunicaremos contigo con más información, permanece atenta. Saludos.

@juana23788686 Sabemos la incomodidad que genera la demora en respuesta a tu caso y por ello estamos realizando las gestiones respectivas, por favor mantente al tanto de tus medios de contacto. Saludos.
@prewcastle Hola, we understand your concerns about the delay in the response. As soon as we have information we will contact you by email. Kind regards.
@mamma0113 Hi, we are still working on your case, and we'll send more information through email as soon as possible. Regards.
@juana23788686 Hola, te enviamos una respuesta por DM. Saludos.
@gopackjo We are glad to know about it, if you have any questions or doubts, just write to us. We hope to see you on a next adventure. Regards.
@Katheri97478416 Hola, por favor nos indicas vía DM el número de tu caso así como el correo electrónico asociado. Quedamos atentos.
@juana23788686 Hola Juana, te hemos enviado una respuesta vía DM. Quedaremos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@TrooperSteve_ We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@TrooperSteve_ Hi, please send us a DM with your ticket number. Regards.
@Kallie_Akua Hi, send us a DM with your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name. We'll stay tuned.

Stay updated and learn about our policy regarding the use and types of face masks required on all our flights as of March 1st here👇 Keep in mind that if your mask does not meet the standards, you will not be allowed to board. https://t.co/P2bSm8ksUS https://t.co/eUyFQtENty

Please go to https://t.co/6chgDVa84M check out all the details if you need to change your tickets without penalty. Remember that every time you make a change, if the new option's fare is higher than the original one, you will have to pay the fare difference. https://t.co/fS5oVzJOnQ
@m_damone Please have the certainty that your case is being worked on. When we have an update, we will let you know through your email. Regards.
@m_damone Hi, we continue to work on your case, and once we have an answer, we will let you know through your email. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 We sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 We have sent you a DM. Regards.

urls.title: Self-service and Contact Center | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Here you will find the answer to the most frequent questions. You can communicate with us on our WhatsApp number or call us if you still have any questions and we will do our best to help you.

data.text: @SissyRadford Hello, you can check the available Contact Center numbers we have, through this link: https://t.co/9jjNxROpeV; if you still need assistance, send us a DM. Regards.

@globalsinergy3 Hello, could you please send us by DM more information about your booking code (6 capital letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger name and last name, in order to verify the situation for you. Regards.
@TamaraShea Hello Tamara, tell us by DM your reservation code or ticket number so we can help you. We stay tuned.
@flklrsurf You can check more information about health and safety measures through the previous link that we sent.
@jeremyatl1 Hello, we gave you a response through DM. Regards.
